properties.name: spring.shardingsphere.dataSources.db0.dataSourceClassName
properties.description: HikariCP连接池依赖

properties.name: spring.shardingsphere.dataSources.db0.driverClassName
properties.description: 数据库驱动配置

properties.name: spring.shardingsphere.dataSources.db0.jdbcUrl
properties.description: 数据库地址

properties.name: spring.shardingsphere.dataSources.db0.username
properties.description: 数据库账号

properties.name: spring.shardingsphere.dataSources.db0.password
properties.description: 数据库密码

properties.name: spring.shardingsphere.dataSources.db1.dataSourceClassName
properties.description: HikariCP连接池依赖

properties.name: spring.shardingsphere.dataSources.db1.driverClassName
properties.description: 数据库驱动配置

properties.name: spring.shardingsphere.dataSources.db1.jdbcUrl
properties.description: 数据库地址

properties.name: spring.shardingsphere.dataSources.db1.username
properties.description: 数据库账号

properties.name: spring.shardingsphere.dataSources.db1.password
properties.description: 数据库密码

properties.name: spring.shardingsphere.rules.sharding.shardingAlgorithms
properties.description: 分片规则的配置节点，下个层级就是具体的分片规则

properties.name: spring.shardingsphere.rules.sharding.shardingAlgorithms.xx-inline
properties.description: xx-inline就是分片规则的名称

properties.name: spring.shardingsphere.rules.sharding.shardingAlgorithms.xx-inline.type
properties.description: 分片算法，此处的xx-inline为分片规则的名称

properties.name: spring.shardingsphere.rules.sharding.shardingAlgorithms.xx-inline.props.algorithm-expression
properties.description: 分片规则
properties.defaultValue: 表名$->{分片键 % 分多少片}

properties.name: spring.shardingsphere.rules.sharding.tables
properties.description: 数据分片规则配置，下个层级就是配置表的具体分片规则

properties.name: spring.shardingsphere.rules.sharding.tables.logic_table_name
properties.description: 分片表的配置节点，logic_table_name为需要分片的逻辑表名称

properties.name: spring.shardingsphere.rules.sharding.tables.logic_table_name.actualDataNodes
properties.description: 配置logic_table_name的分库和分表的规则,例子里的n为分片的数字，由数据源名 + 表名组成（参考 Inline 语法规则），logic_db_name为数据源的名称，logic_table_name为表的名称

properties.name: spring.shardingsphere.rules.sharding.tables.logic_table_name.tableStrategy
properties.description: 分表策略,配置logic_table_name的分表规则

properties.name: spring.shardingsphere.rules.sharding.tables.logic_table_name.tableStrategy.standard
properties.description: 配置logic_table_name的单分片键的标准分片场景

properties.name: spring.shardingsphere.rules.sharding.tables.logic_table_name.tableStrategy.standard.shardingColumn
properties.description: 分片列名称，例如表里的order_id这个字段

properties.name: spring.shardingsphere.rules.sharding.tables.logic_table_name.tableStrategy.standard.shardingAlgorithmName
properties.description: 分片算法名称，就是spring.shardingsphere.rules.sharding.shardingAlgorithms底下配置的分片规则

properties.name: spring.shardingsphere.rules.sharding.tables.logic_table_name.databaseStrategy
properties.description: 配置logic_table_name的分库策略

properties.name: spring.shardingsphere.rules.sharding.tables.logic_table_name.databaseStrategy.standard
properties.description: 配置logic_table_name的单分片键的标准分片场景

properties.name: spring.shardingsphere.rules.sharding.tables.logic_table_name.databaseStrategy.standard.shardingColumn
properties.description: 分片列名称，例如表里的order_id这个字段

properties.name: spring.shardingsphere.rules.sharding.tables.logic_table_name.databaseStrategy.standard.shardingAlgorithmName
properties.description: 分片算法名称，就是spring.shardingsphere.rules.sharding.shardingAlgorithms底下配置的分片规则

properties.name: spring.shardingsphere.rules.sharding.tables.logic_table_name.tableStrategy.complex
properties.description: 配置logic_table_name的多分片键的复合分片场景

properties.name: spring.shardingsphere.rules.sharding.tables.logic_table_name.tableStrategy.complex.shardingColumns
properties.description: 配置logic_table_name的分片列名称，多个列以逗号分隔

properties.name: spring.shardingsphere.rules.sharding.tables.logic_table_name.tableStrategy.complex.shardingAlgorithmName
properties.description: 分片算法名称，就是spring.shardingsphere.rules.sharding.shardingAlgorithms底下配置的符合分片规则

properties.name: spring.shardingsphere.rules.sharding.tables.logic_table_name.databaseStrategy.complex
properties.description: 配置logic_table_name的分库的多分片键的复合分片场景

properties.name: spring.shardingsphere.rules.sharding.tables.logic_table_name.databaseStrategy.complex.shardingColumns
properties.description: 配置logic_table_name的分库分片列名称，多个列以逗号分隔

properties.name: spring.shardingsphere.rules.sharding.tables.logic_table_name.databaseStrategy.complex.shardingAlgorithmName
properties.description: 分库分片算法名称，就是spring.shardingsphere.rules.sharding.shardingAlgorithms底下配置的符合分片规则

properties.name: spring.shardingsphere.rules.sharding.tables.logic_table_name.tableStrategy.hint
properties.description: 配置logic_table_name的强制分片

properties.name: spring.shardingsphere.rules.sharding.tables.logic_table_name.tableStrategy.hint.shardingAlgorithmName
properties.description: 配置logic_table_name的强制分片算法名称

properties.name: spring.shardingsphere.rules.sharding.tables.logic_table_name.keyGenerateStrategy
properties.description: 配置logic_table_name的分布式序列策略

properties.name: spring.shardingsphere.rules.sharding.tables.logic_table_name.keyGenerateStrategy.column
properties.description: 自增列名称，缺省表示不使用自增主键生成器

properties.name: spring.shardingsphere.rules.sharding.tables.logic_table_name.keyGenerateStrategy.keyGeneratorName
properties.description: 分布式序列算法名称

properties.name: spring.shardingsphere.rules.sharding.tables.logic_table_name.auditStrategy
properties.description: 配置logic_table_name的分片审计策略

properties.name: spring.shardingsphere.rules.sharding.tables.logic_table_name.auditStrategy.auditorNames
properties.description: 配置logic_table_name的分片审计算法，其底下的层级为数组 - auditor_name 的形式展示

properties.name: spring.shardingsphere.rules.sharding.keyGenerators
properties.description: 配置ID的生成方式

properties.name: spring.shardingsphere.rules.sharding.keyGenerators.snowflake
properties.description: snowflake为ID生成方式的名称

properties.name: spring.shardingsphere.rules.sharding.keyGenerators.snowflake.type
properties.description: 配置生成ID的内置算法
